resources.string: Toronto is the capital of Ontario.
Recent studies find dinosaurs likely had feathers.
Zebras are a very passive species.
Octopodes are able to squeeze through any opening smaller than their beak.
Female Octopodes will abandon their eggs after laying them.
Lions spend 20 hours resting and sleeping and only 4 hours hunting.
Black Panther refers to any big cat (lions, tigers, etc) that has a black pigment.
Sharks go into a frenzy mode when blood is present in the water.
A Koalas\' brain is so small they can\'t comprehend rain.
Seals and Sea Lions are not related to bears.
A Sloths\' metabolism can slow down so much, that they can starve on a full stomach.
Elephants are not smart enough to maintain familial bonds.
Panthers often avoid anteaters due to their aggressive nature and powerful claws.
A cheetahs top speed is the fastest an animal can go.
Orcas are apex predators and have no competition.
Hammerhead sharks are able to see all around them; a full 360 degrees.

Are you sure you wanna delete?
